entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
